summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5818 for the improvement of 29th Avenue West, from Fort Street to Jameson Street on the east; by constructing watermains and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 76663 as amended by Ordinance No. 76848 and 77349, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
